array.name: sickness
array.item: MINOR BURNS
TOOTHACHE
MINOR Wound
NOSE BLEED
ITCHY THROAT
MIGRAINE
COLD
FEVER
DOG BITE
CHOKING

array.name: treatment_1
array.item: Soothe the burn with cold water.

array.name: treatment_2
array.item: Take off jewelry that is on the affected area

array.name: treatment_3
array.item: Take off jewelry that is on the affected area

array.name: treatment_4
array.item: Donâ€™t pop blisters

array.name: treatment_5
array.item: Combat pain with over-the-counter medications; Ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin IB), Naproxen sodium (Aleve), Acetaminophen (Tylenol)

array.name: treatment_6
array.item: Call a doctor right away if there are signs of infection.

array.name: treatment_7
array.item: Rinse your mouth with a glass full of warm water with one teaspoon of common table salt, or sea salt.

array.name: treatment_8
array.item: Floss to remove food particles and plaque

array.name: treatment_9
array.item: Dab a couple of drops of clove oil onto a cotton ball and gently rub onto the aching tooth

array.name: treatment_10
array.item: Wrap an ice cube in a clean cloth or tissue and apply it directly to the outside of your cheek adjacent to the sore tooth for about 10 minutes.

array.name: treatment_11
array.item: Wash your hands and then use a clean bandage or cloth to press firmly on the wound.

array.name: treatment_12
array.item: Wash the skin around the wound with soap and a clean washcloth. Gently pat the wound and surrounding tissues dry.

array.name: treatment_13
array.item: After you have stopped the bleeding and cleaned the wound, apply an antibiotic cream to protect it from infection.

array.name: treatment_14
array.item: Cover the wound with a bandage

array.name: treatment_15
array.item: Monitor the wound to make sure it does not get infected. If it shows signs of infection, call a Doctor immediately

array.name: treatment_16
array.item: Sit down, tilt head forward so that the blood drains through the nostrils.

array.name: treatment_17
array.item: With a finger and thumb, pinch the lower fleshy end of the nose, completely blocking the nostrils.

array.name: treatment_18
array.item: With a finger and thumb, pinch the lower fleshy end of the nose, completely blocking the nostrils.

array.name: treatment_19
array.item: Take a small clean cotton ball or gauze piece, add 1-2 drops of oxymetazoline nasal sprays spray to it, insert them into the nostrils, continue pinching the nostrils, and check for bleeding after 10 minutes.

array.name: treatment_20
array.item: Wash your nose and rest.

array.name: treatment_21
array.item: Add half a teaspoon of salt to 8 ounces of warm water and mix well. Sip and gargle for 10 seconds, then spit--do NOT swallow.

array.name: treatment_22
array.item: Eat some honey. (Never give honey to infants under the age of 12 months)

array.name: treatment_23
array.item: Add a small amount of honey to cup and fill with hot water then, squeeze 1-3 wedges of lemon in. Finally, grate a small amount of ginger, stir ,and drink

array.name: treatment_24
array.item: Before bedtime, boil a cup of milk in a saucepan with a teaspoon of turmeric. Cool slightly before drinking.

array.name: treatment_25
array.item: Add a tablespoon of apple cider vinegar to 8oz of hot water and sip slowly. You can add up to a tablespoon of honey to the drink to improve the taste.

array.name: treatment_26
array.item: Try to drink at least 8 glasses of water per day and drink plenty of green and herbal teas.

array.name: treatment_27
array.item: To maintain a regular sleep schedule. Get up and go to bed at the same time every day if possible.

array.name: treatment_28
array.item: To maintain a regular sleep schedule. Get up and go to bed at the same time every day if possible.

array.name: treatment_29
array.item: Try not to sleep late.

array.name: treatment_30
array.item: Blow your nose gently to avoid excess pressure by pressing one nostril shut with your finger, while blowing very gently to clear the other, then repeating on the other side

array.name: treatment_31
array.item: Pour hot water into a mug, stir in 1 1/2 tablespoons of lemon juice and two teaspoons of honey and drink.

array.name: treatment_32
array.item: Pour hot water into a mug, stir in 1 1/2 tablespoons of lemon juice and two teaspoons of honey and drink.

array.name: treatment_33
array.item: Take a hot bath or shower.

array.name: treatment_34
array.item: Take Temperature

array.name: treatment_35
array.item: Give an over-the-counter medicine such as acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) as directed on the label if the fever is 102 F or higher.

array.name: treatment_36
array.item: Have the person drink plenty of fluids to stay hydrated

array.name: treatment_37
array.item: Place a clean towel over the injury to stop any bleeding.

array.name: treatment_38
array.item: Try to keep the injured area elevated and wash the bite carefully with soap and water.

array.name: treatment_39
array.item: Apply a sterile bandage to the wound

array.name: treatment_40
array.item: Call a doctor immediately.

array.name: treatment_41
array.item: Wrap your arms around the waist. Tip the person forward slightly.

array.name: treatment_42
array.item: Clench one fist and place it right above their belly button an put the other hand on top of your fist and pull sharply inwards and upwards.

array.name: treatment_43
array.item: Continue giving 5 back blows and 5 abdominal thrusts until the victim begins coughing or the object is dislodged
